column4: Since upgrading to Ubuntu 12.04, I've been unable to type properly as my ' key has been overridden to create special characters. How do I turn that off?
u have to select ur keyboard in "keyboard preferences"
I have a regular US Logitech Access 600 Keyboard. I've try several different keyboard options and they all still have the strange ' key behaviour. What am I missing?
I set it explicitly to a Logitech Access Keyboard using Keyboard settings (English US, alternative international) but accent entry mode on Â´ key persists....
